评论概述: A short girl's new favorite shoe
评论详情: I purchased these shoes to wear for new year's and could not be more pleased with them. They are cute and comfortable and give just enough boost in height. We were downtown, indoors, outdoors, walking around for 5+ hrs and I had no issues. I can no longer wear regular heals and have to find good platforms or wedges to add any height. So many wedges have the narrowing in the heel, where these do not. They are very sturdy and stable, without sacrificing being fashionable. I have already ordered them in additional colors!
I officially own these shoes in nearly every color! They are so comfortable, and I’ve even worn them to walk around NYC for several days!

These are my favorite shoes I own! I love all Soda brand shoes. They just fit me very well and they are comfortable. I guess I would consider my foot wide? For reference, I cannot wear any Steve Madden shoes because they are narrow. Anyway, I get so many compliments on them and I plan on buying more when these wear out. Love love love them!! Buy them, you can’t beat them for the price!
